title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A hearty Russian dish made with sautéed pieces of beef served in a rich sour cream sauce.
Steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the beef slices and cook until browned. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add onions and garlic. Sauté until soft.
Add the mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid.
Sprinkle the flour over the mixture and stir well.
Pour in the beef broth and simmer until it thickens slightly.
Stir in the sour cream, Dijon mustard, and cooked beef. Cook for another 5 minutes until heated through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
summary: A nutritious bowl filled with quinoa, roasted veggies, and topped with tahini dressing.
Steps: Toss the sweet potatoes and broccoli with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes until tender.
In a small bowl, mix tahini, lemon juice, water, and garlic to make the dressing.
Assemble the bowl by adding quinoa, roasted sweet potatoes, broccoli, chickpeas, and avocado slices.
Drizzle with tahini dressing and serve.

title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
summary: Quick and easy shrimp cooked with lemon, garlic, and fresh parsley, served over rice.
Steps: Heat olive oil and butter in a large pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and red pepper flakes (if using) and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add the shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side until pink and opaque.
Stir in the lemon juice and zest, and cook for another 1-2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, then sprinkle fresh parsley over the shrimp.
